Klasse FuzzyCMeans

java.lang.Object
de.clusterfreak.ClusterCore.FuzzyCMeans
public class FuzzyCMeans extends Object
Fuzzy-C-Means (FCM)

Cluster analysis with Fuzzy-C-Means clustering algorithm 

 Step 1: Initialization
 Step 2: Determination of the cluster centers
 Step 3: Calculate the new partition matrix
 Step 4: Termination or repetition
 Step 5: optional - Repeat calculation (steps 2 to 4)
Version:
1.7.0 (2024-12-07)
Autor:
Thomas Heym

      public FuzzyCMeans(double[][] object, int clusterCount)
      Generates FCM-Object from a set of Points
      Parameter:
      object - Objects
      clusterCount - Number of clusters

    • FuzzyCMeans

      public FuzzyCMeans(double[][] object, int clusterCount, double e)
      Generates FCM-Object from a set of Points
      Parameter:
      object - Objects
      clusterCount - Number of clusters
      e - Termination threshold, initial value 1.0e-7

  • Methodendetails

    • determineClusterCenters

      public double[][] determineClusterCenters(boolean random, boolean returnPath)
      Returns the cluster centers
      Parameter:
      random - random initialization
      returnPath - Determines whether return the complete search path. Values: true, false
      Gibt zurück:
      Cluster centers and search path (optional); The cluster centers are at the end.

    • getMik

      public double[][] getMik()
      Returns the partition matrix (Membership values of the k-th object to the i-th cluster) The method is also called from Pos±sibilisticCMeans.
      Gibt zurück:
      Partition matrix

    • setMik

      Set partition matrix

      setMik - partition matrix
